item.title: Tone Sweep - REAPER JSFX Percussion Synth
item.description:
You can download it from here: Tone Sweep on Github or Simply add my repository in ReaPack: RCJacH ReaPack Repository
Description: This synth generates a monophonic sweeping tone when receiving a MIDI note input. Intended for designing percussive sounds, such as kicks, snares, toms, or sound FXs in electronic music genres.
Quick Instruction: Set a starting and ending note. If necessary, change the Pitch Sweep Curve and length by dragging the Pitch Curve Graph, x axis for length, and y axis for curve.
